title.en: A Prayer for the Spread of Kyabje Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche’s Termas

text.en: The great tertön, the majestic Vajradhara, Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche,
text.en-trans: terchen dil khyen dorjé chang chenpö

text.en: Revealed an excellent and most supreme path – profound treasures possessed of the four modes of liberation.1
May they spread far and wide throughout the entire world and all hidden lands,
text.en-trans: dzamling chi dang bé yul char tokpar

text.en: Endure long into the future, and bring spontaneous benefit for both self and other.
text.en-trans: dargyé yün né dön nyi lhündrub shok
